titlestmt.titleproper: Russell Sage Foundation records, Office of the President, Eric Wanner papers, Record Group 1
A Guide to the Russell Sage Foundation records, Office of the President, Eric Wanner papers, Record Group 1 FA764

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-09-02 19:09:02 -0400.

did.unittitle: Russell Sage Foundation records, Office of the President, Eric Wanner papers, Record Group 1

physdesc.extent: 6 letter document storage boxes, 2 record storage boxes, and 1 Half letter document storage box

did.physdesc: 8 letter document storage boxes and 1 Half letter document storage box

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Eric Wanner was president of the Russell Sage Foundation from 1986 - 2012. The Russell Sage Foundation (RSF) is a foundation devoted to research in social sciences. Eric Wanner developed the Foundation's long-standing research programs on behavioral economics, poverty and inequality in the United States, the economic and social impacts of U.S. immigration.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Material retained orginal order and is organized by working papers numbers.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred to the RAC by Russell Sage Foundation and ingested by the RAC as Accession 2013:077.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains working papers from the office of Eric Wanner from his time as President of the Russell Sage Foundation.
